title: Advanced science: isotopes
brief_description: This film describes the nature and production of isotopes; radio-active isotopes and their use in industry and medicine. Shows natural uranium being separated into isotopes; uses lithium as an example to explain the meaning of isotopes; history of their discovery; methods of separating isotopes, and the making of radio-isotopes and their uses are illustrated.
